column4: is it better to stay using Ubuntu 8.04 or to upgrade to 9.10 ?
for a newbie which better 9.04 or 8.04 ?

They each have their quirks.  There is a lot more info on the net about 8.04 problems than 9.04.  I try to run all of my servers in KVM now so I can backup the image, upgrade and see what breaks for what type of applications I need on them
